text: [Music]

center software to the AWS cloud VMware

scale hybrid cloud environments locally
and globally to match the needs of your
business
simplify an optimizer disaster recovery

competitiveness and pace of innovation

available highly secure an innovative

can deploy new environments and services

AWS workloads can also take advantage of

exploits
